title: Vishnu Institute of Technology: Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Placement
meta_description: Vishnu Institute of Technology Admission 2024 is open for various courses. Vishnu Institute of Technology Admission is based on national level entrance exam and merit basis. Check latest updates and news on Vishnu Institute of Technology Admission 2024, Cutoff, Courses, Fees, Reviews, Rankings, Placement and other details.

faqs.question: How good are the library facilities at Vishnu Institute for Technology?
faqs.answer: Ans.The library at VITB is fully computerized and furnished, containing a large number of volumes, titles, journals, periodicals and newspapers. It is equipped with 37287 Volumes, 6194 Titles,114 Journals, and 24 Magazines.

faqs.question: Is there hostel accommodation available for students at Vishnu Institute for Technology?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes, the hostel facility is provided with separate accommodation for Male and Female students at VITB, with fully furnished AC and Non AC (2 bed & 3 bed) rooms have attached bath, balcony and a common dining hall as well as audio-visual lounge.Check:VIT Bhimavaram Hostel

faqs.question: Is there an innovation or special learning centre at Vishnu Institute for Technology?
faqs.answer: Ans.Yes. Vishnu Educational Development and Innovation Centre (VEDIC) is a unique privately funded residential campus established in 2016. The mission of VEDIC is to facilitate and provide transformative interactive learning experiences for the leadership, faculty, students and non-teaching staff of VITB.

Section.name: About VIT
Section.description:
Vishnu Institute for Technology, Bhimavaram was established under the aegis of Sri Vishnu Educational Society in the year 2008. The institute is ranked 149th for B.Tech by IndiaToday 2022 and ranked 106th for B.Tech by The Week 2022. VIT Bhimavaram offers undergraduate and postgraduate programs in the discipline of Computer Science and Engineering, Electronics and Communication Engineering, Electrical and Electronics Engineering and many more. Admission is based on marks obtained in the qualifying exam.

Ques. How good are the library facilities at Vishnu Institute for Technology?
Ans. The library at VITB is fully computerized and furnished, containing a large number of volumes, titles, journals, periodicals and newspapers. It is equipped with 37287 Volumes, 6194 Titles,114 Journals, and 24 Magazines.
Ques. Is there hostel accommodation available for students at Vishnu Institute for Technology?
Ans. Yes, the hostel facility is provided with separate accommodation for Male and Female students at VITB, with fully furnished AC and Non AC (2 bed & 3 bed) rooms have attached bath, balcony and a common dining hall as well as audio-visual lounge.
Check: VIT Bhimavaram Hostel
Ques. Is there an innovation or special learning centre at Vishnu Institute for Technology?
Ans. Yes. Vishnu Educational Development and Innovation Centre (VEDIC) is a unique privately funded residential campus established in 2016. The mission of VEDIC is to facilitate and provide transformative interactive learning experiences for the leadership, faculty, students and non-teaching staff of VITB.
